General.Name: Amigo Holdings PLC
General.Description: Amigo Holdings PLC, through its subsidiaries, provides loans to individuals in the United Kingdom and Ireland. The company also engages in trading and financing activities. Amigo Holdings PLC was founded in 2005 and is based in Bournemouth, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Nova Building, Bournemouth, United Kingdom, BH2 5LT

5.Name: Kate  Patrick
5.Title: Head of External Affairs & Investor Relations
